field.name: ENC
field.description: Encrypt/Decrypt. This bit selects encryption or decryption

field.name: ICV_TEST
field.description: ICV Checking / Test AES fault detection

field.name: ALG
field.description: Algorithm. This field specifies which algorithm is being selected

field.name: ALG
field.description: Algorithm. This field specifies which algorithm is being selected

field.name: KS
field.description: Key Size. This is the size of a Key measured in bytes

enumeratedValue.description: Reset all CHAs in use by this CCB

field.name: AES
field.description: Reset AESA. Writing a 1 to this bit resets the AES Accelerator core engine

field.name: DES
field.description: Reset DESA. Writing a 1 to this bit resets the DES Accelerator

field.name: PK
field.description: Reset PKHA. Writing a 1 to this bit resets the Public Key Hardware Accelerator

field.name: IM
field.description: Interrupt Mask. Once this bit is set, it can only be cleared by hard reset

enumeratedValue.description: DMA Request and Done signals disabled for the PKHA
DMA Request and Done signals enabled for the PKHA
DMA Request and Done signals disabled for the Input FIFO
DMA Request and Done signals enabled for the Input FIFO
DMA Request and Done signals disabled for the Output FIFO
DMA Request and Done signals enabled for the Output FIFO

field.name: IFS
field.description: Input FIFO Byte Swap. Byte swap all data that is written to the Input FIFO

field.name: OFS
field.description: Output FIFO Byte Swap. Byte swap all data that is read from the Onput FIFO

field.name: CM
field.description: Clear the Mode Register. Writing a one to this bit causes the Mode Register to be cleared

field.name: CICV
field.description: Clear the ICV Size Register. Writing a one to this bit causes the ICV Size Register to be cleared

field.name: CCR
field.description: Clear the Context Register. Writing a one to this bit causes the Context Register to be cleared

field.name: CPKA
field.description: Clear the PKHA A Size Register

field.name: CPKB
field.description: Clear the PKHA B Size Register

field.name: CPKN
field.description: Clear the PKHA N Size Register

field.name: CPKE
field.description: Clear the PKHA E Size Register

field.name: COF
field.description: Clear Output FIFO. Writing a 1 to this bit causes the Output FIFO to be cleared

field.name: CIF
field.description: Clear Input FIFO. Writing a 1 to this bit causes the Input Data FIFO

enumeratedValue.description: Data Size Error, including PKHA N Register Size Error
Key Size Error, including PKHA E Register Size Error
Data Arrived out of Sequence Error

CCM AAD Size Error (either 1. AAD flag in B0 =1 and no AAD type provided, 2. AAD flag in B0 = 0 and AAD povided, or 3. AAD flag in B0 =1 and not enough AAD provided - expecting more based on AAD size.)

field.name: CL1
field.description: algorithms. The algorithms field indicates which algorithm is asserting an error. Others reserved

field.name: AL
field.description: AAD Last. Only AAD data will be written into the Input FIFO

field.name: IL
field.description: IV Last. Only IV data will be written into the Input FIFO

field.name: PKASZ
field.description: PKHA A Size. This is the size of the numeric value, in bytes, contained within the PKHA A Register

field.name: PKBSZ
field.description: PKHA B Size. This is the size of the numeric value, in bytes, contained within the PKHA B Register

field.name: PKNSZ
field.description: PKHA N Size. This is the size of the numeric value, in bytes, contained within the PKHA N Register

field.name: PKESZ
field.description: PKHA E Size. This is the size of the numeric value, in bytes, contained within the PKHA E Register

field.name: IF0
field.description: Instantiated Flag 0. State Handle 0 has been instantiated

field.name: IF1
field.description: Instantiated Flag 1. State Handle 1 has been instantiated

field.name: TF0
field.description: Test Flag State Handle 0. State Handle 0 has been instantiated as a test (deterministic) instance

field.name: TF1
field.description: Test Flag State Handle 1. State Handle 1 has been instantiated as a test (deterministic) instance

field.name: RESINT0
field.description: This read-only register holds the Reseed Interval for State Handle 0

register.name: RNG4_DRNG_HASH_CONTROL
register.description: LTC RNG4 DRNG Hash Control Register

field.name: HD
field.description: Hashing Done. This bit asserts when the hashing engine is done

field.name: HB
field.description: Hashing Begin. Writing this bit will cause the Hashing Engine to begin hashing

field.name: HI
field.description: Hashing Initialize. Writing this bit will initialize the Hashing Engine

field.name: HTM
field.description: Hashing Test Mode. Writing this bit will put RNG in Hashing Test Mode

field.name: HTC
field.description: Hashing Test Mode Clear. Writing this bit will take the RNG out of hashing test mode

register.name: RNG4_DRNG_HASH_DIGEST
register.description: LTC RNG4 DRNG Hash Digest Register

field.name: HASHBUF
field.description: This write-only register provides access to the internal SHA-256 hashing engine's 64-byte buffer

field.name: IFL
field.description: Input FIFO Level. These bits indicate the current number of entries in the Input FIFO

field.name: IFF
field.description: Input FIFO Full. The Input FIFO is full and should not be written to

field.name: OFL
field.description: Output FIFO Level. These bits indicate the current number of entries in the Output FIFO

field.name: OFF
field.description: Output FIFO Full. The Output FIFO is full and should not be written to
